sentences.english: You need be for balance and contrast, for prayer and inner peace
sentences.chinese: 你需我来趋于衡平，寻求对照，潜心祝祷，舒缓内心。

sentences.english: The experiments were done most carefully again and again.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验被一遍又一遍潜心致志地做过。

sentences.english: It would do painstaking research on topics like Guantanamo, and then issue reports.
sentences.chinese: 它会做像关塔那摩主题的潜心研究，然后发出报告。

sentences.english: Do we always stop enjoying where we are, only to worry about where we are going?
sentences.chinese: 我们会不会不再潜心欣赏风景，而总是担心要去哪里？

sentences.english: Her father had spent several years in Japan studying Zen.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲过去到过日本几年，潜心研究禅学。

sentences.english: He is working on the research and development of the latest teaching software.
sentences.chinese: 他目前正潜心研究最新的教学软件。

sentences.english: With great concentration is mainly to help mentor young Master Chen edited by cooking the books, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 现主要潜心协助恩师陈绪荣大师编著烹饪书籍等工作。

sentences.english: I possess superpowers cultivated through careful study and dedicated practice.
sentences.chinese: 通过自己研究和潜心练习，我拥有了超能力。

sentences.english: There are other ways to do this exercise.
sentences.chinese: 一个潜心于特殊技术方法练习的人。

sentences.english: Then he gave up everything to remain a recluse practitioner.
sentences.chinese: 于是一介布衣，潜心在山林中独居修行。

sentences.english: The Collaboration is dedicated to consumer involvement in principle.
sentences.chinese: 合作潜心于原则上包括的用户。

sentences.english: It was invented and refined by Thompson over eight years.
sentences.chinese: 这项成果是汤普森潜心研究超过8年的发明。

sentences.english: In the evenings, he buries himself in a book.
In 1932 his family moved to Lions Park, Suzhou, network, painting with great concentration.
sentences.chinese: 1932年举家移居苏州网狮园，潜心作画。

sentences.english: While you're at it, hide your smartphone there too.
sentences.chinese: 当你潜心工作时，把你的智能手机也藏好。

sentences.english: He concentrates on the tradition, but can " change the hair clucked " , stores quintessence alone .
sentences.chinese: 他潜心钻研传统，却能“换去毛咕”，独存精华。

definition: to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
to lurk under water/to immerse oneself in (study etc)/to lie low/to keep a low profile/quiet/reserved/self-possessed
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
to cultivate the heart and nurture the character (idiom); to improve oneself by meditation
to forge ahead vigorously/to dedicate oneself to progress
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
lit. to have accumulated knowledge and deliver it slowly (idiom)/good preparation is the key to success/to be well prepared
